value: Wildflower DSS is a small, family-owned disability support provider serving NDIS participants across the Lockyer Valley, Ipswich & surrounds. We promote independence in everyday life with dignity and care.

Our team of qualified and experienced support workers are passionate about making a real difference. We take the time to understand your unique needs and create a support plan that works for you. Whether it's domestic assistance, getting out in the community, respite, or supported independent living â€” we're here for you.
